July can be a taxing time for firms within the Professions arena especially the legal sector, as they typically find themselves under pressure to pay the second and final portion of their income tax liability for the financial year. 
Even the most profitable of businesses can find themselves short of cash when a large payment is due. A late payment to HMRC can incur a penalty or fine, so having the option to finance can provide a great deal of comfort. 
These businesses frequently prefer to take advantage of funding over a 6 or 12 Month term, rather than giving the HMRC a sizeable slice of their existing working capital in one go.
